Rebecca Bell (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1953) bụ ọkachamara na agụmakwụkwọ gburugburu ebe obibi si Maryland, United States. Bell bụ onye ndu n'iweta ihe gbasara gburugburu ebe obibi na usoro ọmụmụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze Maryland wee sọpụrụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi sayensị nke afọ Maryland Middle School

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka mmemme onye nkuzi n'oké osimiri nke National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration nke ya na ndị sayensị na-arụkọ ọrụ iji nyochaa mgbanwe na gburugburu ebe obibi. N'afọ 2008, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Delaware II, na-akwado NOAA na nyocha ha gbasara usoro okike ogologo oge. Bell na-ejekwa ozi na Gọvanọ Maryland Martin O'Malley's Climate Change Commission.
N'afọ 2009, a họpụtara ya dị ka Women's History Month Honoree site na National Women's Story Project.
